name: Premium Wolly
deskripsi: These pants are very comfortable, elegant, and practical for various occasions. With thick yet soft fabric, these culottes provide a stylish and elegant look while maintaining the comfort of the wearer. Suitable for both formal and casual events, and can be paired with various types of tops.

name: Baby Corduroy
deskripsi: Despite having a relatively thick texture, baby corduroy remains breathable, especially when made from cotton. This makes it suitable for moderate to cold weather. It offers excellent comfort, perfect for everyday wear or formal events.

name: Cotton
deskripsi: Cotton has many benefits, including comfort, excellent sweat absorption, and ease of maintenance.
